title: Reconciling With a Prodigal Child
itunes:author: Featured Guests: Pastors Bill Putman & Jim Putman
itunes:summary:
In the story of the prodigal son in the Bible, the father spotted his son in the distance and ran to meet him. John and Danny help parents prepare for the day their prodigal child returns.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast. Or, call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get the book "Hope for the Prodigal": https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2020-11-10?refcd=1025705

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/reconciling-with-a-prodigal-child/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey
